EmailTemplate.name: Trial Onboarding Experiment - GTM-1296 / GTM-1274.ACQ - InExperienced - Day 11 -
EmailTemplate.subject: Set yourself up for success
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Read our insightful articles to create a successful business. Log in to your control panel <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=InExperienced&utm_term=Day+11+Email+7&utm_content=Control+Panel]]> Tactics for growing your business READ OUR GUIDE <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Learning/Guide-to-Running-Your-Store/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=InExperienced&utm_term=Day+11+Email+7&utm_content=Read+Guide]]> BigCommerce is more than just an ecommerce platform — we’re here to help you create a successful business. Here are some other insightful articles that help accelerate your growth:
- Small business boot camp - how to scale and start your business <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/rs/695-JJT-333/images/small-business-bootcamp.pdf?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=InExperienced&utm_term=Day+11+Email+7&utm_content=SB+Boot+Camp]]>
- How to Set Up a Customer Loyalty Program and Increase Customer Lifetime Value More Than 150% <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/how-to-set-up-a-loyalty-program-and-increase-customer-lifetime-value-more-than-150/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=InExperienced&utm_term=Day+11+Email+7&utm_content=Customer+Loyalty+Program]]>
- 4 Metrics that Aren’t What They Seem –– Plus, Actionable Steps to Increase Your Bottom Line <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/ecommerce-analytics-4-metrics-arent-seem-plus-actionable-steps-increase-bottom-line/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=Trial+Onboarding&utm_campaign=InExperienced&utm_term=Day+11+Email+7&utm_content=4+Metrics]]>
